name: OR_LOG_PRENTXT
description: The OR_LOG_PRENTXT table contains OR management system log preop notes.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the log record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the pre-op notes information for the log.

columns.name: PREOP_NOTES
columns.description: The pre-op notes attached to the log.
